dc:title: The Organizer
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A chronicle of the life of Cesar Chavez and his organizing work with the National Farm Workers Association. Admires his commitment to non-violence, religious and moral values, and "hope and faith animated by love." Says he is a man of vision and experience. Notes the CW's long-time coverage of agricultural worker struggles.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 831 1966-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
